    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Pet[] pets,
              int money)
        Initialises a new Player instance with the given name and array of pets. Sets food and toys to their respective empty collections.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player, set at the start of the game. This will not change
        pets - A collection of the pets belonging to a player
        money - How much money the player starts with

      • Player

        public Player(java.lang.String name,
              Pet[] pets,
              java.util.HashMap<FoodType,java.lang.Integer> food,
              java.util.ArrayList<Toy> toys,
              int money,
              int score)
        Creates a new Player instance with the given properties. Should only be used when loading from a save game to reload a previously created player.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player, set at the start of the game. This will not change
        pets - A collection of the pets belonging to a player
        food - A mapping of FoodTypes to the amount the player has of them
        toys - A collection of the toys belonging to a player
        money - How much money the player starts with
        score - How much score the player currently has

        public int getScore()

      • changeMoney

        public void changeMoney(int amount)
        Changes the amount of money the player has by a given amount.
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of money to change the player's balance by (positive to give money to player, negative to take money away).

      • changeScore

        public void changeScore(int value)
        Changes the score of the player by a given value.
        Parameters:
        value - The value to change the player's score by (positive to add score).

      • addFood

        public void addFood(FoodType foodToAdd)
        Adds one copy of the given food to the player�s inventory.
        Parameters:
        foodToAdd - A reference to the FoodType object you wish to add one of.

      • addToy

        public void addToy(Toy toy)
        Adds the given toy to the player�s inventory.
        Parameters:
        toy - A reference to the Toy object you want to add to the player's inventory.

      • feed

        public void feed(Pet pet,
                 FoodType foodType)
        The player feeds a pet a food. The food is consumed and removed from the player's inventory.
        Parameters:
        pet - The pet to be fed
        foodType - The food to feed the pet

      • playWith

        public boolean playWith(Pet pet,
                        Toy toy)
        The player plays with a pet using a toy. The toy is damaged and possibly broken by this.
        Parameters:
        pet - The pet to be played with
        toy - The toy object to use for playing
        Returns:
        True if the toy does not break, false otherwise
